pre_caption: This video presents a static or very slowly moving aerial scenery shot of London. The view looks down on the River Thames and Tower Bridge, with the words "EAST - WEST" superimposed over the water. The scene is captured during what appears to be sunrise or sunset, casting a warm, hazy light over the city.
